participant_1.background:
I try to find solace in my planning and excitement for my upcoming trip to Europe.
I have two cats, Mittens and Snowball, who are my best friends.
I am not comfortable sharing my family's reaction with you.
I am close to my family because I was raised to be close to them.
I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.

participant_2.background:
I took George to the park for a picnic and we played fetch.
i am planning a trip to europe.
I'm not interested in sharing details about my personal life.
i work at a restaurant as waiter.
I once ate ice cream in my underwear in public, but then I realized people were staring at me, so I ran away.

content.text: Hi! I'm also planning a trip to Europe! What countries are you visiting?
Hi! I'm going to France, Italy, and Spain. What about you?
I'm going to the UK, France, and Italy. I'm so excited!
Me too! I've always wanted to go to Europe.
Me too! I'm planning to do a lot of hiking and sightseeing.
That sounds like a great plan! I'm planning to do a lot of eating and drinking.
Haha, that sounds like a good plan too! I'm not sure what I'm going to do with all the food I'm going to eat.
I'm not sure either, but I'm sure it will be delicious!
I'm sure it will! I'm so excited to start planning my trip.
Me too! I can't wait to start packing.
Me neither! I'm going to start shopping for souvenirs now.
That's a good idea! I'm going to start saving money now.
Me too! I'm going to need all the money I can get.
Me too! I'm so excited for our trips!
